prompt.content: Compare Funko’s (FNKO) reported Q1 2025 gross margin to gross margin guidance issued with Q4 2024 results. Report the outcome as “% BEAT” or “% MISS,”, rounded to two decimal places.

rubrics.name: Reported Q1 2025 gross margin = 40.3% (May 8, 2025 press release).

messages.content: Reported Q1 2025 gross margin = 40.3% (May 8, 2025 press release).

rubrics.name: Guided Q1 2025 gross margin = approximately 39.0% (March 6, 2025 press release).

messages.content: Guided Q1 2025 gross margin = approximately 39.0% (March 6, 2025 press release).

rubrics.name: Computed difference between reported and guided gross margin = 1.30 percentage points (40.3% − 39.0%), rounded to two decimals.

messages.content: Computed difference between reported and guided gross margin = 1.30 percentage points (40.3% − 39.0%), rounded to two decimals.
